articles.title: Southeast Asian Leaders Discuss Myanmar Crisis With Junta Chief - NDTV
articles.description: Southeast Asian leaders began a crisis meeting on Myanmar on Saturday aiming to persuade Senior General Min Aung Hlaing, who led the military takeover that sparked turmoil in his country, to forge a path to end the violence.
